recommendations.recommendation: Jay is an amazing programmer, team player, and innovator. Jay took the time to understand the testing behind our LIMS system so that he could deliver a better product for us. He would often anticipate our needs and make suggestions for improvements and enhancements before we realized we were going to need it. No request was too large or to small for him and he never limited our creativity in the product. Jay is by far one of the best developers I have ever had the pleasure to work alongside.
recommendations.title: General Manager

recommendations.recommendation: Dedication, Technical proficiency, Team player…these are just a few of the outstanding traits that come to mind when describing Jay DeLeonardis.
recommendations.title: Lead Project Analyst

recommendations.recommendation: I cannot recommend Jay highly enough and I will miss having his positive attitude and sense of humor around. Good colleagues can be hard to come by, and your team would be missing out on the opportunity for a great one by not considering Jay.
recommendations.title: Teaching Assistant

recommendations.recommendation: I have had the opportunity to work with lots of talented students, but it is rare to come across a talented student as hard-working and driven as Jay. Beyond his obvious talent Jay has gone above and beyond to learn everything he can so that his code is not only functional, but efficient and elegantly written.
recommendations.title: Teaching Assistant

recommendations.recommendation: Jay has an extensive background in managing databases and has added an ability to make flawless front-end interfaces and an impressive knowledge of JavaScript to supplement that experience. Never one to back down from a challenge Jay has built out several impressive Full-Stack applications and would be a valuable addition to any team - whether that team's need is front-end, back-end, or full-stack.
recommendations.title: Teaching Assistant

recommendations.recommendation: Despite the ever-changing requirements that occur in software systems over time, much of Jay’s code and overall design are still in place today requiring little to no maintenance or refactoring. This is the sign of a highly astute developer in that Jay created a dynamic system that continues to scale and grow with the needs and demands of the business.
recommendations.title: Lead Project Analyst

recommendations.recommendation: Jay also brings into the workplace environment an exceptionally good work ethic as well as the appropriate dose of humor. On numerous occasions, Jay’s positive attitude served to create a more amiable work atmosphere that resulted in better collaboration and productivity within the team.
recommendations.title: Lead Project Analyst

recommendations.recommendation: Jay earns my highest recommendation. Any company looking to add a valuable member to its software team should look no further.
recommendations.title: Lead Project Analyst

recommendations.recommendation: On all occasions, I found Mr. DeLeonardis to be extremely knowledgeable and very timely in his delivery of high quality work. He is most certainly a team player and I would welcome him on any project team of which I am a part.
recommendations.title: Chief Medical Officer

recommendations.recommendation: Jay is such a focused, dedicated, and approachable worker. He took the time to learn new complicated technologies even if it took all night. He was so patient and had a great mindset when approaching the applications we made. I learned so much from him and I hope to work with him again in the future.
recommendations.title: Full Stack Software Developer

recommendations.recommendation: Jay is an extremely hard working individual. He will tackle any task at hand with full effort. While working with Jay, he never shied away from any task. He would research and implement any new package needed for the project. Jay was a great team member. He made me feel like I was heard and supported throughout every step of the process.
recommendations.title: Teacher

recommendations.recommendation: Immediately, he caught on - what took some developers months to understand, Jay did so in just minutes. It was clear he had a far deeper understanding of how software worked than anyone else on the team.
recommendations.title: Development Engineer

recommendations.recommendation: Working with Jay has been an absolute pleasure and I sincerely hope I will be able to do so again in the future. He is a brilliant developer with an unparalleled ability to communicate with and lead his team.
recommendations.title: Development Engineer

recommendations.recommendation: We have several student interns working on this project, and Jay's 'lead by example' style has had a very positive, multiplier effect among our students. He is very practical, quick with solutions.
recommendations.title: Editor and CEO
